hero.hero_welcome: Hello, I'm Phong - a web developer and a codeholic :)

common.name: Le Thanh Phong
common.title: Digital Nomad (Web Developer)
common.description: Hi Im Phong - a student at FPU University with aim to become a better software engineer day by day as well as a specialist in Javascript. The one who love to utilize the technology, visual art especially web to build anything that assists his life as well as surroundings better.
